author: psmith
msg: And now for the all important Restlet's themselves... oops.

author: psmith
msg: Pinpoint Service now exposes a series of Restlet graphs to show performance metrics.
You can browse on port 8182 on the host running the Service to monitor indexing rates
I'm greatful to Dave Cheney for showing me this Restlet trick in a previous Aconex hackathon.  Nifty!

author: peterreilly
msg: optionaly allow build to pass even if tests fail
